snippet: “A Royal Passion: Queen Victoria and Photography,” at the Getty Museum in Los Angeles, reveals a monarch who quickly adopted a new art form and used it for her own purposes.
abstract: Exhibit A Royal Passion: Queen Victoria and Photography, at Getty Museum in Los Angeles, reveals ways that Queen Victoria adopted and exploited new art form in mid-19th century.
lead_paragraph: “A Royal Passion: Queen Victoria and Photography,” at the Getty Museum in Los Angeles, reveals a monarch who quickly adopted a new art form and used it for her own purposes.

headline.main: Love Those Royal Family Photos? It All Started With Victoria.
headline.print_headline: Love Those Royal Family Photos? It All Started With Victoria.
